email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have an inquiry for a shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The laycan is proposed for November 10-15. Could you provide a freight offer for this shipment?

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers International

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. The laycan can be adjusted to November 12-17 if needed.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
John Carter
Maritime Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the prompt response. The laycan adjustment to November 12-17 works for us. However, the freight rate of USD 18.50 per MT is higher than the current market rate. Could you consider lowering it to USD 17.00 per MT?

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers International

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering our long-standing relationship, we can revise the freight rate to USD 17.50 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 25,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John Carter
Maritime Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the freight rate of USD 17.50 per MT and the demurrage rate of USD 25,000 per day. Please confirm the laycan of November 12-17 and send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Sea Brokers International

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

I confirm the laycan of November 12-17. I will send the contract for your review shortly. Thank you for your business.

Best regards,
John Carter
Maritime Freight Solutions
